template.name: el-row
template.value: el-row :gutter="$gutter$"> <el-col :span="$span$">$cont$</el-col> </el-row>

template.name: el-button
template.value: el-button type="$type$">$buttonCont$</el-button>

template.name: el-button-group
template.value: el-button-group> 上一页 下一页

template.name: el-radio
template.value: el-radio v-model="$radio$" label="$label$">$radioCont$</el-radio>

template.name: el-radio-group
template.value: el-radio-group v-model="$model$"> <el-radio :label="$label1$">$cont1$</el-radio> <el-radio :label="$label2$">$cont2$</el-radio> </el-radio-group>

template.name: el-radio-button
template.value: el-radio-button label="$radioButtonCont$"></el-radio-button>

template.name: el-checkbox
template.value: el-checkbox v-model="$checkbox$" >$checkboxCont$</el-checkbox>

template.name: el-checkbox-group
template.value: el-checkbox-group v-model="$checkedCityList$"> <el-checkbox v-for="$city$ in $cityList$" :label="$label$" :key="$key$">{{$cityCont$}}</el-checkbox> </el-checkbox-group>

template.name: el-checkbox-button
template.value: el-checkbox-button :label="$checkboxLabel$" :key="$checkboxKey$" >$checkboxCont$</el-checkbox-button>

template.name: el-input
template.value: el-input v-model="$input$" placeholder="$placeholder$"></el-input>

template.name: el-input:textarea
template.value: el-input type="textarea" placeholder="$placeholder$" v-model="$model$"></el-input>

template.name: el-autocomplete
template.value: el-autocomplete class="inline-input" v-model="$model$" :fetch-suggestions="querySearch" placeholder="$placeholder$" @select="handleSelect"></el-autocomplete>

template.name: el-input-number
template.value: el-input-number v-model="$model$" @change="$handleChange$" :min="$min$" :max="$max$" label="$label$"></el-input-number>

template.name: el-select
template.value: el-select v-model="$model$" placeholder="$placeholder$"> <el-option v-for="$item$ in $optionsList$" :key="$item$.value" :label="$item$.label" :value="$item$.value"> </el-option> </el-select>

template.name: el-cascader
template.value: el-cascader :options="$options$" v-model="$selectedOptions$" @change="$handleChange$"></el-cascader>

template.name: el-switch
template.value: el-switch v-model="$value$"active-color="$activeColor$"inactive-color="$inactiveColor$"></el-switch>

template.name: el-slider
template.value: el-slider v-model="$model$"></el-slider>

template.name: el-time-select
template.value: el-time-select v-model="$value$" :picker-options="{start: '$start$',step: '$step$',end: '$end$'}" placeholder="$placeholder$"></el-time-select>

template.name: el-time-picker
template.value: el-time-picker v-model="$value$" :picker-options="{ selectableRange: '$start$ - $end$' }" placeholder="$placeholder$"></el-time-picker>

template.name: el-date-picker
template.value: el-date-picker v-model="$value$" type="date" placeholder="$placeholder$"></el-date-picker>

template.name: el-date-picker:datetime
template.value: el-date-picker v-model="$value$" type="datetime" placeholder="$placeholder$"></el-date-picker>

template.name: el-upload
template.value:
el-upload class="upload-demo" action="https://www.demo.com/posts/" :on-preview="handlePreview(file)" :on-remove="handleRemove(file, fileList)" :before-remove="beforeRemove(files, fileList)" multiple :limit="3" :on-exceed="handleExceed(files, fileList)" :file-list="[{name: 'name', url: 'url'}, {name: 'name2', url: 'url'}]"> 点击上传
只能上传jpg/png文件，且不超过500kb

template.name: el-upload:avatar
template.value: el-upload class="avatar-uploader" action="https://www.dmeo.com/posts/" :show-file-list="false" :on-success="handleAvatarSuccess(res, file)" :before-upload="beforeAvatarUpload(file)">

template.name: el-rate
template.value: el-rate v-model="value2" ></el-rate>

template.name: el-rate:colors
template.value: el-rate v-model="value2" :colors="['#99A9BF', '#F7BA2A', '#FF9900']"> </el-rate>

template.name: el-rate:halfstar
template.value: el-rate v-model="3.7" disabled show-score text-color="#ff9900" score-template="{value}"> </el-rate>

template.name: el-color-picker
template.value: el-color-picker v-model="color1"></el-color-picker>

template.name: el-transfer
template.value: el-transfer v-model="modelList" :data="[{key: 1, label: '备选项1', disabled: false}, {key: 2, label: '备选项2', disabled: true}]"></el-transfer>

template.name: el-transfer:search
template.value: el-transfer v-model="modelList" :data="[{key: 1, label: '备选项1', disabled: false}, {key: 2, label: '备选项2', disabled: true}]" filterable :filter-method="filterMethod" filter-placeholder="请输入城市拼音"></el-transfer>

template.name: el-form
template.value:
el-form ref="form" :model="form" label-width="80px">
</el-form>

template.name: el-form:inline
template.value:
el-form :inline="true" :model="formInline" class="demo-form-inline">
</el-form>

template.name: el-form-item:input
template.value: el-form-item label="活动名称"> <el-input v-model="form.name"></el-input> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-form-item:select
template.value: el-form-item label="活动区域"> <el-select v-model="form.region" placeholder="请选择活动区域"> <el-option label="区域一" value="shanghai"></el-option> <el-option label="区域二" value="beijing"></el-option> </el-select> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-form-item:time
template.value: el-form-item label="活动时间"> <el-col :span="11"> <el-date-picker type="date" placeholder="选择日期" v-model="form.date1" style="width: 100%;"></el-date-picker> </el-col> <el-col class="line" :span="2">-</el-col> <el-col :span="11"> <el-time-picker type="fixed-time" placeholder="选择时间" v-model="form.date2" style="width: 100%;"></el-time-picker> </el-col> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-form-item:switch
template.value: el-form-item label="即时配送"> <el-switch v-model="form.delivery"></el-switch> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-form-item:checkbox
template.value: el-form-item label="活动性质"> <el-checkbox-group v-model="form.type"> <el-checkbox label="美食/餐厅线上活动" name="type"></el-checkbox> <el-checkbox label="地推活动" name="type"></el-checkbox> <el-checkbox label="线下主题活动" name="type"></el-checkbox> <el-checkbox label="单纯品牌曝光" name="type"></el-checkbox> </el-checkbox-group> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-form-item:radio
template.value: el-form-item label="特殊资源"> <el-radio-group v-model="form.resource"> <el-radio label="线上品牌商赞助"></el-radio> <el-radio label="线下场地免费"></el-radio> </el-radio-group> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-form-item:textarea
template.value: el-form-item label="活动形式"> <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.desc"></el-input> </el-form-item>

template.name: el-table
template.value: el-table :data="[{ date: '2016-05-02', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄' }, { date: '2016-05-04', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄' }]" style="width: 100%"> <el-table-column prop="date" label="日期" width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="name" label="姓名" width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="address" label="地址"> </el-table-column> </el-table>

template.name: el-table:border
template.value: el-table border :data="[{ date: '2016-05-02', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄' }, { date: '2016-05-04', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄' }]" style="width: 100%"> <el-table-column prop="date" label="日期" width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="name" label="姓名" width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="address" label="地址"> </el-table-column> </el-table>

template.name: el-table:fixedheader
template.value: el-table :data="[{ date: '2016-05-02', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄' }, { date: '2016-05-04', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄' }]" height="250" border style="width: 100%"> <el-table-column prop="date" label="日期" width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="name" label="姓名" width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="address" label="地址"> </el-table-column> </el-table>

template.name: el-table:select
template.value: el-table ref="multipleTable" :data="[{ date: '2016-05-02', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄' }, { date: '2016-05-04', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄' }]" tooltip-effect="dark" style="width: 100%" @selection-change="handleSelectionChange"> <el-table-column type="selection" width="55"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column label="日期" width="120"> <template slot-scope="scope">{{ scope.row.date }}</template> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="name" label="姓名" width="120"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="address" label="地址" show-overflow-tooltip> </el-table-column> </el-table>

template.name: el-table:sort
template.value: el-table :data="[{ date: '2016-05-02', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄' }, { date: '2016-05-04', name: '王小虎', address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄' }]" style="width: 100%" :default-sort = "{prop: 'date', order: 'descending'}" > <el-table-column prop="date" label="日期" sortable width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="name" label="姓名" sortable width="180"> </el-table-column> <el-table-column prop="address" label="地址" :formatter="formatter"> </el-table-column> </el-table>

template.name: el-table-column:left
template.value: el-table-column header-align="left" align="left" prop="columnProp" label="columnLabel" > </el-table-column>
